mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_tbl (user_name, email, password, phone, address, birthday, level) VALUES(#{user_name}, #{email}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{address}, #{birthday}, #{level})
mapper.select: SELECT user_id, user_name, email, password, phone, address, birthday, level FROM user_tbl WHERE user_name = #{user_name}
SELECT user_id, user_name, email FROM user_tbl WHERE user_id = #{user_id}
